nodes.text: Sector six was a sector within the Castilon system. Prior to the Hosnian Cataclysm, Kragan Gorr's Warbird gang attacked a Darius G-class freighter carrying several kowakian monkey-lizards and a kowakian ape-lizard. The Resistance pilots Poe Dameron and Kazuda Xiono along with their BB-series astromech droids BB-8 and CB-23 investigated the incident and managed to rescue the pirate Synara San.
